verbs.description: record number of [ARG1: hanford workers] [V: sickened] [ARG0: by toxic vapors] an unprecedented number of workers at hanford have been exposed to dangerous chemical vapors since thursday april 28 king 5 broke the story on twitter wednesday that in the past five work days a total of 42 people have sought medical attention after suffering symptoms due to chemical vapor releases or as a precautionary measure bob ferguson music hanford challenge federal government of the united states hanford
